title: RAY BARBEE "THE ELEMENT PERSPECTIVE"
description:
A proven legend in front of the lens, Element Advocate Ray Barbee is equally talented behind it. Ray ignites the Element "Perspective" program, a series of short films that gives insight to a photographer through a selected image. The image also appears within a collection of limited edition tees now available at ElementBrand.com

Directed by:
Kirk Dianda

Filmed by:
Kirk Dianda
Amber B Dianda
Ryan Young

Original soundtrack:
"Dusty Jam"
Loren Humphrey

Shot on location at Ed and Deanna Templeton's darkroom in Huntington Beach. Intro title-sequence shot at Studio 35 in Costa Mesa, with cameras courtesy of Mark Oblow.
